name: Catch the time
description:
This is Catch the Time

You have to collect clocks to survive.
If the time ran out, you lose.

There are currently five levels to play.
Each level has an individual item to collect.

---Controls---

W,Space,UP = Jump
D,RIGHT = Right
A,LEFT = Left
esc = Pause 
strg + alt + K = Give up
# = Console (Only possible in the title screen or level selection).
You can also use a controller.

You can join the "Catch the time"-Discord server, to give me some feedback or report bugs.

---Upadate---
